name: playwright-userinyerface-test
description: - install Node JS: https://nodejs.org/en/download/ - go to project folder:      - ```npm init playwright@latest```            - *TypeScript*         - *tests*  - install extension Playwright test for VS code: [Ctrl]+[Shift]+[P]     - once installed, open the command panel and type: Install Playwright - install extension ESLint - in playwright.config.ts:      - added screenshots only on failure      - video: 'on' - to run the test and see the results:      - ```npx playwright test --reporter=html```     - ```npx playwright show-report``` - to run tests:      - **all**: ```npx playwright test```     - **specific file**: ```npx playwright test tests/your-file.spec.ts```     - **specific folder/dir**: ```npx playwright test tests/your-dir/```
